scripts.build: npm run build:templates && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:templates && npm run build:webpack:dev
scripts.build:webpack: webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp resources/js/build/*.js public/static/app/ && cp resources/js/build/*.map public/static/app/ 2>/dev/null || true && node scripts/generate-assets-order.js
scripts.build:webpack:dev: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development && cp resources/js/build/*.js public/static/app/ && cp resources/js/build/*.map public/static/app/ 2>/dev/null || true && node scripts/generate-assets-order.js
scripts.compile: npm run build:templates && npm run build:webpack
scripts.compile:dev: npm run build:templates && npm run build:webpack:dev
scripts.compile:node: npm run build:templates:node && npm run build:webpack
scripts.compile:node:dev: npm run build:templates:node && npm run build:webpack:dev
scripts.compile:clean: rm -rf resources/js/build/* && rm -rf public/static/app/*.js && rm -rf public/static/app/*.map
scripts.compile:full: npm run compile:clean && npm run compile
